definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

pinyin: ai4 qing2 zheng1 fu2 yi1 qie4

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 于我，在爱情的河流里，我经常觉得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: In Love + Sex With Robots, Levy explains how human-robot love can become a reality.
sentences.chinese: Levy在书中说人与机器间的爱情可以成为现实。

sentences.english: She is an inveterate reader of silly love stories.
sentences.chinese: 她长年不变地读愚蠢的爱情小说。

sentences.english: Ultimately, being with a true soul partner is all about being purposeful in love.
sentences.chinese: 在爱情中拥有一位真正的灵魂伴侣是每个人所希冀的。

sentences.english: This gives Carlisle a renewed impetus to nail Ripley, his love rival.
sentences.chinese: 这使卡莱尔重新追里普利，他的爱情对手。

sentences.english: Actually, the hot feeling of love will cool down after 100 days.
sentences.chinese: 其实，爱情的致热期会在100天后开始冷却。

sentences.english: These two who have true love marry and have the crystal of their love finally.
sentences.chinese: 这两个有情人终成眷属并且拥有了他们爱情的结晶。

sentences.english: The true love belongs to the adults.
sentences.chinese: 真正的爱情是属于成年人的。

sentences.english: Love is a great wrecker of peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 爱情对平和心境有强大破坏力。

sentences.english: Love and it is not mysterious, WWw. 55dou. com it can always fascinated people.
sentences.chinese: 爱情它其实并不神秘，可总是让人对它很着迷。

sentences.english: The Sagittarius' attitude to love drives Virgo out of his/her mind.
sentences.chinese: 射手座对于爱情的态度会让处女座发疯。

sentences.english: So we, with an attitude of pursuing true emotion, seek for love.
sentences.chinese: 于是我们抱着追求真感情的态度，寻找爱情。

sentences.english: Taking time out from their heartbreak, they get back to nature.
sentences.chinese: 逐步从心碎的爱情中走出来后，他们复归自然。

sentences.english: If this is love; is not fair.
sentences.chinese: 要是这就是爱情，素来就不平允。

sentences.english: If you lack courage in love, your life will be colorless.
sentences.chinese: 一个在爱情中缺乏勇气的人，生活也会平淡无味。

sentences.english: One day he showed his friend a love poem he had written to Maria.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他把写给玛利亚的一首爱情诗拿给朋友看。

definition: emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children
